src:
Ivana Yturbe y el asombroso mensaje que le envió a Yahaira y Jefferson
Ivana Yturbe rompió su silencio y así se refirió sobre Yahaira Plasencia y Jefferson Farfán.
01 Nov 2019, 11:57 by Yuriko Cabeza
Rompió su silencio. Ivana Yturbe decidió romper con los rumores y decidió salir al frente y pedir que no la vuelvan a relacionar con Jefferson Farfán, luego que el deportista decidiera mostrar sin problemas su cercanía con Yahaira Plasencia. Sus declaraciones dejó sorprendidos a sus seguidores. ¿Qué dirá la pareja del momento?
Ivana no dudó en desearle lo mejor a la salsera y al futbolista. 



"Desearle mucha felicidad a todos, que sean felices. Todos hemos decidido ser felices y por eso estamos donde estamos", dijo Ivana Yturbe a América Espectáculos.
Antes de culminar la exreina de belleza pidió que, por respeto a la pareja, no la vinculen más con Jefferson Farfán, con quien tuvo un corto romance con el deportista.



"Por respeto a la pareja, mejor dejar de vincularlo conmigo. No creo que a ellos les gusta. Para nadie es agradable que le mencionen cosas del pasado", dijo Yturbe.

text:
Ivana Yturbe and the amazing message she sent to Yahaira and Jefferson
Ivana Yturbe broke her silence and thus referred to Yahaira Plasencia and Jefferson Farfán.
01 Nov 2019, 11:57 by Yuriko Head
He broke his silence. Ivana Yturbe decided to break the rumors and decided to go out in front and ask that they not relate her to Jefferson Farfán again, after the athlete decided to show her proximity to Yahaira Plasencia without problems. His statements left his followers surprised. What will the couple say of the moment?
Ivana did not hesitate to wish the best to the sauce boat and the footballer.



"I wish everyone a lot of happiness, that they are happy. We have all decided to be happy and that is why we are where we are," Ivana Yturbe told América Espectáculos.
Before culminating the beauty exreina, she asked that, out of respect for the couple, not link her more with Jefferson Farfán, with whom he had a short affair with the athlete.



"Out of respect for the couple, it is better to stop linking it with me. I don't think they like it. It is not pleasant for anyone to mention things from the past," said Yturbe.
